column5: Someone sent me this link today. WOW! I knew bears were tough but that's unreal.  Something tells me the next few hours were not so fun for the bear though. I think i'll be extra careful walking to those hidden speckle holes...
Man that was a hard hit.Wonder if he made it after the shock wore off?
Doubt he made it through the night. Just my 2 cents.
IN Russia car not hit bear...bear hit car....daah    Art
Doubt he made it through the night. Just my 2 cents. x 2
Lucky he didn't run out when first car was passing could have caused a bad accident.

I`d say the bear likely died after that. Many hit animals will run a short distance before either dropping dead or laying down to bleed out. But, I guess it`s possible his rear end took the brunt of it and protected his vitals.   Who knows, maybe he got lucky?
